Fun Features.name: Michael's Second Life
Fun Features.description: Plays [Michael Scott's iconic line](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2UMpTktizX4) over the sound effect of the Totem of Undying shattering.

Fun Features.name: Calm4.ogg for Record 11
Fun Features.description:
Changes broken 'Record 11' into a normal looking one that plays the infamous 'calm4.ogg' when inserted into a Jukebox. The disc uses the colors of the old Mojang logo.

***M O J A N G S P E C I F I C A T I O N S !***

Fun Features.name: Emeralds to Rubies
Fun Features.description:
Changes the texture of Emeralds, Emerald Ore and Deepslate Emerald Ore to turn them into the Rubies from Minecraft Earth. Also adds a Deepslate Ore top texture.

inspirationvt

Fun Features.name: Easter Eggs
Fun Features.description:
Adds Painted Eggs that can be created using Eggs and Dyes. Combinations go up to two Dyes at the moment.

requiresefr

⚠️ Careful: All eggs function the same way, they work in all recipes and can be thrown as normal!

attscript
